sentences.en: Angiography in the Diagnosis of Acute Massive Pulmonary Embolism.
sentences.cn: 血管造影诊断急性大块肺栓塞.

sentences.en: Arterial gas embolism occurs in dysbaric pressure workers undergoing rapid decompression.
sentences.cn: 摘要从事异常气压的工作人员于工作压力下做快速的减压上升,可造成空气栓塞症的发生.

sentences.en: Both surgery and coil embolism are options for correcting this anomaly.
sentences.cn: 手术及经导管栓塞皆是治疗此先天性疾病的选择.

sentences.en: Conclusion This method was practical, safe and effective for cerebral embolism.
sentences.cn: 结论该方法用于脑栓塞治疗可行,有效, 安全.

sentences.en: Conclusion: CT is of high value in the diagnosis of artery embolism.
sentences.cn: 结论: CT对肺动脉栓塞具有较高的诊断价值.

sentences.en: Diffusive pulmonary embolism with bone fragments during spinal surgery.
sentences.cn: 脊柱手术时发生肺动脉骨折碎片的弥漫性栓塞.

sentences.en: He died from a pulmonary embolism.
Left medial cerebral arteria is the most embolism position.
sentences.cn: 栓塞部位以左侧大脑中动脉最常见.

sentences.en: Method: 15 patients with subacute fat embolism syndrome were observed and nursed.
sentences.cn: 方法观察和总结15例亚急性脂肪栓塞综合征患者的治疗过程.

sentences.en: Methods: The plasma fibrinogen and D - dimer in pulmonary embolism patients were measured.
sentences.cn: 方法对经临床确诊为肺栓塞患者测定其血浆D - 二聚体与纤维蛋白原浓度.

sentences.en: Objective To discuss the effects of target - artery thrombolytic therapy for cerebral embolism.
sentences.cn: 目的探索动脉靶血管内溶栓治疗脑栓塞的治疗效果.

sentences.en: Pulmonary embolism ( PE ) is one of the common clinical pathological syndromes.
sentences.cn: 肺 栓塞 是常见的临床病理综合征之一.

sentences.en: Pulmonary tumor embolism is rarely the initial manifestation of cervical cancer.
sentences.cn: 摘要以肺肿瘤栓塞为初始表现的子宫颈癌非常罕见.

sentences.en: Purpose : To observe the curative effect of Xanthinol Nieotinate for Acute cerebral Embolism.
sentences.cn: 目的: 观察烟酸占替诺治疗急性脑梗塞的效果.

sentences.en: The method must avoid the production of thrombosis and embolism.
sentences.cn: 此法必须防止产生血栓或栓塞.

trans.tran_en: something such as a hard mass of blood or a small amount of air that blocks a tube carrying blood through the body
